013package org.apache.juneau.bean.openapi3;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.common.internal.Utils.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.internal.CollectionUtils.*;

019import java.util.*;
020
021import org.apache.juneau.common.internal.*;
022import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
023
024/**
025 * Describes a single API operation on a path.
026 *
027 * <p>
028 * The Operation Object describes a single operation (such as GET, POST, PUT, DELETE) that can be performed on a path.
029 * Operations are the core of the API specification, defining what actions can be taken, what parameters they accept,
030 * and what responses they return.
031 *
032 * <h5 class='section'>OpenAPI Specification:</h5>
033 * <p>
034 * The Operation Object is composed of the following fields:
035 * <ul class='spaced-list'>
036 *    <li><c>tags</c> (array of string) - A list of tags for API documentation control
037 *    <li><c>summary</c> (string) - A short summary of what the operation does
038 *    <li><c>description</c> (string) - A verbose explanation of the operation behavior (CommonMark syntax may be used)
039 *    <li><c>externalDocs</c> ({@link ExternalDocumentation}) - Additional external documentation for this operation
040 *    <li><c>operationId</c> (string) - Unique string used to identify the operation
041 *    <li><c>parameters</c> (array of {@link Parameter}) - A list of parameters that are applicable for this operation
042 *    <li><c>requestBody</c> ({@link RequestBodyInfo}) - The request body applicable for this operation
043 *    <li><c>responses</c> (map of {@link Response}, REQUIRED) - The list of possible responses as they are returned from executing this operation
044 *    <li><c>callbacks</c> (map of {@link Callback}) - A map of possible out-of band callbacks related to the parent operation
045 *    <li><c>deprecated</c> (boolean) - Declares this operation to be deprecated
046 *    <li><c>security</c> (array of {@link SecurityRequirement}) - A declaration of which security mechanisms can be used for this operation
047 *    <li><c>servers</c> (array of {@link Server}) - An alternative server array to service this operation
048 * </ul>
049 *
050 * <h5 class='section'>Example:</h5>
051 * <p class='bjava'>
052 *    <jc>// Create an Operation object for a GET endpoint</jc>
053 *    Operation <jv>operation</jv> = <jk>new</jk> Operation()
054 *       .setTags(<js>"pet"</js>)
055 *       .setSummary(<js>"Find pets by status"</js>)
056 *       .setDescription(<js>"Multiple status values can be provided with comma separated strings"</js>)
057 *       .setOperationId(<js>"findPetsByStatus"</js>)
058 *       .setParameters(
059 *          <jk>new</jk> Parameter()
060 *             .setName(<js>"status"</js>)
061 *             .setIn(<js>"query"</js>)
062 *             .setDescription(<js>"Status values that need to be considered for filter"</js>)
063 *             .setRequired(<jk>true</jk>)
064 *             .setSchema(
065 *                <jk>new</jk> SchemaInfo().setType(<js>"string"</js>)
066 *             )
067 *       )
068 *       .setResponses(
069 *          JsonMap.<jsm>of</jsm>(
070 *             <js>"200"</js>, <jk>new</jk> Response()
071 *                .setDescription(<js>"successful operation"</js>)
072 *                .setContent(
073 *                   JsonMap.<jsm>of</jsm>(
074 *                      <js>"application/json"</js>, <jk>new</jk> MediaType()
075 *                         .setSchema(<jk>new</jk> SchemaInfo().<jsm>setType</jsm>(<js>"array"</js>))
076 *                   )
077 *                )
078 *          )
079 *       );
080 * </p>
081 *
082 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
083 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://spec.openapis.org/oas/v3.0.0#operation-object">OpenAPI Specification &gt; Operation Object</a>
084 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/docs/specification/paths-and-operations/">OpenAPI Paths and Operations</a>
085 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauBeanOpenApi3">juneau-bean-openapi-v3</a>
086 * </ul>
087 */
088@FluentSetters
089public class Operation extends OpenApiElement {
090
091   private List<String> tags;
092   private String summary, description, operationId;
093   private ExternalDocumentation externalDocs;
094   private List<Parameter> parameters;
095   private RequestBodyInfo requestBody;
096   private Map<String,Response> responses;
097   private Map<String,Callback> callbacks;
098   private Boolean deprecated;
099   private List<SecurityRequirement> security;
100   private List<Server> servers;
101
102   /**
103    * Default constructor.
104    */
105   public Operation() {}
106
107   /**
108    * Copy constructor.
109    *
110    * @param copyFrom The object to copy.
111    */
112   public Operation(Operation copyFrom) {
113      super(copyFrom);
114      this.tags = copyOf(copyFrom.tags);
115      this.summary = copyFrom.summary;
116      this.description = copyFrom.description;
117      this.operationId = copyFrom.operationId;
118      this.externalDocs = copyFrom.externalDocs;
119      this.parameters = copyOf(copyFrom.parameters);
120      this.requestBody = copyFrom.requestBody;
121      this.responses = copyOf(copyFrom.responses);
122      this.callbacks = copyOf(copyFrom.callbacks);
123      this.deprecated = copyFrom.deprecated;
124      this.security = copyOf(copyFrom.security);
125      this.servers = copyOf(copyFrom.servers);
126   }
127

133   public List<String> getTags() {
134      return tags;
135   }

144      this.tags = value;
145      return this;
146   }
147

149    * Sets the tags list.
150    *
151    * @param value The new value for this property.

153    */
154   public Operation setTags(String...value) {
155      setTags(listBuilder(String.class).sparse().add(value).build());
156      return this;
157   }

160    * Bean property appender:  <property>tags</property>.
161    *
162    * <p>
163    * A list of tags for API documentation control.
164    *
165    * @param values
166    *    The values to add to this property.
167    *    <br>Ignored if <jk>null</jk>.
168    * @return This object.
169    */
170   public Operation addTags(String...values) {
171      tags = listBuilder(tags).sparse().add(values).build();
172      return this;
173   }
174
175   /**
176    * Bean property appender:  <property>tags</property>.
177    *
178    * <p>
179    * A list of tags for API documentation control.
180    *
181    * @param values
182    *    The values to add to this property.
183    *    <br>Ignored if <jk>null</jk>.
184    * @return This object.
185    */
186   public Operation addTags(Collection<String> values) {
187      tags = listBuilder(tags).sparse().addAll(values).build();
188      return this;
189   }

271   /**

273    *

275    */
276   public List<Parameter> getParameters() {
277      return parameters;
278   }
279
280   /**
281    * Returns the parameter with the specified type and name.
282    *
283    * @param in The parameter in.  Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
284    * @param name The parameter name.  Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
285    * @return The matching parameter, or <jk>null</jk> if not found.
286    */
287   public Parameter getParameter(String in, String name) {
288      assertArgNotNull("in", in);
289      assertArgNotNull("name", name);
290      if (parameters != null)
291         for (var p : parameters)
292            if (eq(p.getIn(), in) && eq(p.getName(), name))
293               return p;
294      return null;
295   }
296

298    * Sets the parameters list.

304      this.parameters = value;
305      return this;
306   }

317   }

339   /**
340    * Returns the responses map.
341    *
342    * @return The responses map.
343    */
344   public Map<String,Response> getResponses() {
345      return responses;
346   }
347
348   /**
349    * Returns the response with the given status code.
350    *
351    * @param status The HTTP status code.  Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
352    * @return The response, or <jk>null</jk> if not found.
353    */
354   public Response getResponse(String status) {
355      assertArgNotNull("status", status);
356      return responses == null ? null : responses.get(status);
357   }
358
359   /**
360    * Returns the response with the given status code.
361    *
362    * @param status The HTTP status code.
363    * @return The response, or <jk>null</jk> if not found.
364    */
365   public Response getResponse(int status) {
366      return getResponse(String.valueOf(status));
367   }

491   @Override /* OpenApiElement */
492   public <T> T get(String property, Class<T> type) {
493      assertArgNotNull("property", property);
494      return switch (property) {
495         case "tags" -> toType(getTags(), type);
496         case "summary" -> toType(getSummary(), type);
497         case "description" -> toType(getDescription(), type);
498         case "operationId" -> toType(getOperationId(), type);
499         case "externalDocs" -> toType(getExternalDocs(), type);
500         case "parameters" -> toType(getParameters(), type);
501         case "requestBody" -> toType(getRequestBody(), type);
502         case "responses" -> toType(getResponses(), type);
503         case "callbacks" -> toType(getCallbacks(), type);
504         case "deprecated" -> toType(getDeprecated(), type);
505         case "security" -> toType(getSecurity(), type);
506         case "servers" -> toType(getServers(), type);
507         default -> super.get(property, type);
508      };
509   }
510
511   @Override /* OpenApiElement */
512   public Operation set(String property, Object value) {
513      assertArgNotNull("property", property);
514      return switch (property) {
515         case "callbacks" -> setCallbacks(mapBuilder(String.class, Callback.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
516         case "deprecated" -> setDeprecated(toType(value, Boolean.class));
517         case "description" -> setDescription(Utils.s(value));
518         case "externalDocs" -> setExternalDocs(toType(value, ExternalDocumentation.class));
519         case "operationId" -> setOperationId(Utils.s(value));
520         case "parameters" -> setParameters(listBuilder(Parameter.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
521         case "requestBody" -> setRequestBody(toType(value, RequestBodyInfo.class));
522         case "responses" -> setResponses(mapBuilder(String.class, Response.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
523         case "security" -> setSecurity(listBuilder(SecurityRequirement.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
524         case "servers" -> setServers(listBuilder(Server.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
525         case "summary" -> setSummary(Utils.s(value));
526         case "tags" -> setTags(listBuilder(String.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
527         default -> {
528            super.set(property, value);
529            yield this;
530         }
531      };
532   }
533
534   @Override /* OpenApiElement */
535   public Set<String> keySet() {
536      var s = setBuilder(String.class)
537         .addIf(callbacks != null, "callbacks")
538         .addIf(deprecated != null, "deprecated")
539         .addIf(description != null, "description")
540         .addIf(externalDocs != null, "externalDocs")
541         .addIf(operationId != null, "operationId")
542         .addIf(parameters != null, "parameters")
543         .addIf(requestBody != null, "requestBody")
544         .addIf(responses != null, "responses")
545         .addIf(security != null, "security")
546         .addIf(servers != null, "servers")
547         .addIf(summary != null, "summary")
548         .addIf(tags != null, "tags")
549         .build();
550      return new MultiSet<>(s, super.keySet());
551   }
